title: 10-Minute Morning Yoga
description: Start your day with energy and focus.

title: Healthy Smoothie Recipes
description: Boost your nutrition with delicious recipes.
content:
The Green Goddess

Spinach is the star here. Blend 1 cup of spinach, 1 banana, 1/2 cup of almond milk, and a spoon of peanut butter. It's rich in iron and keeps you full until lunch.

Berry Blast

Antioxidants galore! Mix blueberries, strawberries, greek yogurt, and a dash of honey.

title: Breathing Patterns for Instant Calm
description: A 10-minute audio walkthrough for high-stress days.

title: 7-Day Anti-Inflammatory Meal Plan
description: A structured, budget-friendly plan to reduce inflammation.
content:
Day 1: Reset

Start with warm lemon water. For lunch, have a quinoa salad with chickpeas. Dinner is baked salmon with asparagus.

Day 2: Greens

Focus on leafy greens today. Kale salad for lunch, spinach stir-fry for dinner.

title: Desk Mobility Routine
description: 5 movements to undo 6+ hours of sitting.

title: Advanced Guide to Digital Productivity
description: Track sleep, hydration, meals, and focus blocks in one view.
content:
The Dashboard

The key to digital productivity is a centralized dashboard. Use tools like Notion or Obsidian to link your daily tasks with your long-term goals.

Time Blocking

Allocate specific hours for 'Deep Work' where no notifications are allowed.

title: Emotional Regulation 101
description: Core skills for managing overwhelm and emotional spikes.
content:
Naming the Emotion

The first step to regulation is identification. Are you angry, or are you hurt? Are you anxious, or are you excited?

Grounding Techniques

Use the 5-4-3-2-1 technique: Name 5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, and 1 you taste.

title: Introduction to Mindful Eating
description: Change your relationship with food by paying attention.

title: Building a Strength Training Habit
description: A beginner's guide to lifting weights for long-term health.
content:
Starting Small

Do not rush into heavy weights. Focus on form. The 'Big 3' compound movements are Squat, Bench Press, and Deadlift.

Frequency

Aim for 3 days a week with at least one rest day in between.

title: The Science of Sleep
description: Understand the stages of sleep and how to improve its quality.
content:
REM vs Deep Sleep

Deep sleep repairs the body, while REM sleep repairs the mind. Both are critical.

Sleep Hygiene

Keep the room cool (around 65F/18C) and dark. Avoid blue light 1 hour before bed.

title: How to Stop Procrastinating
description: Actionable strategies to overcome procrastination today.

title: Fermented Foods for Gut Health
description: Learn about kefir, kimchi, and kombucha.
content:
Why Ferment?

Fermentation creates probiotics, which are beneficial bacteria for your gut microbiome.

Top Foods

  • Kimchi
  • Sauerkraut
  • Kefir
  • Miso

title: The Imposter Syndrome
description: A podcast discussing the feelings of being a fraud.

title: Time Blocking Your Day
description: A guide to managing your time effectively.
content:
The Pomodoro Technique

Work for 25 minutes, break for 5. After 4 cycles, take a longer break.

The Eisenhower Matrix

Categorize tasks into Urgent/Important, Not Urgent/Important, etc.

title: MuscleWiki
description: A comprehensive wiki for exercises based on muscle groups.

title: Insight Timer
description: Free library of guided meditations and music.
